items.sentence: Tom has a feeling that Mary might show up in a few minutes.
Tom has been living in Boston for the past couple of years.
Tom smelled Mary\'s perfume as soon as he entered the room.
I just want a little more freedom to make my own decisions.
I know that Tom went to Boston. I wonder if Mary went, too.
Tom wondered if Mary would tell him what he wanted to know.
When did you find out that Tom wasn\'t old enough to drink?
When did you find out that Tom wasn\'t old enough to drive?
Tom was hoping everyone would leave, so he could go to bed.
Did you know there was a Chinese restaurant on Park Street?
